## IIcon interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IIcon extends IFocusableNode 
```
**Extends:** [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [applyColour()](./blockly.iicon.applycolour.md) | Updates the icon's color when the block's color changes.. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.iicon.dispose.md) | Disposes of any elements of the icon. |
|  [getSize()](./blockly.iicon.getsize.md) |  |
|  [getType()](./blockly.iicon.gettype.md) |  |
|  [getWeight()](./blockly.iicon.getweight.md) |  |
|  [hideForInsertionMarker()](./blockly.iicon.hideforinsertionmarker.md) | Hides the icon when it is part of an insertion marker. |
|  [initView(pointerdownListener)](./blockly.iicon.initview.md) | Creates the SVG elements for the icon that will live on the block. |
|  [isClickableInFlyout(autoClosingFlyout)?](./blockly.iicon.isclickableinflyout.md) | _(Optional)_ Check whether the icon should be clickable while the block is in a flyout. If this function is not defined, the icon will be clickable in all flyouts. |
|  [isShownWhenCollapsed()](./blockly.iicon.isshownwhencollapsed.md) |  |
|  [onClick()](./blockly.iicon.onclick.md) | Notifies the icon that it has been clicked. |
|  [onLocationChange(blockOrigin)](./blockly.iicon.onlocationchange.md) | Notifies the icon that it has changed locations. |
|  [setOffsetInBlock(offset)](./blockly.iicon.setoffsetinblock.md) | Notifies the icon where it is relative to its block's top-start, in workspace units. |
|  [updateCollapsed()](./blockly.iicon.updatecollapsed.md) | Updates the icon's collapsed-ness/view when the block's collapsed-ness changes. |
|  [updateEditable()](./blockly.iicon.updateeditable.md) | Updates the icon's editability when the block's editability changes. |
